text: aur agar tumhaaree beeviyon mein se koee aurat tumhaare haath se nikal kar kaaphiron ke paas chalee jae aur (kharch na mile) aur tum (un kaafiron se lado aur looto to (maale ganeemat se) jinakee auraten chalee gayeen hain unako itana de do jitana unaka kharch hua hai) aur jis khuda par tum log eemaan lae ho usase darate raho
